data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Form,
        Radio,
        Stack,
        Text,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let logic_state = "vanilla";
</script>

<Text is="strong">
    Select an Ice Cream Flavor
    <Text is="sup">{logic_state}</Text>
</Text>

<Stack spacing="small" margin_top="small">
    <Form.Group
        logic_name="radio-preview"
        bind:logic_state
    >
        <Radio
            id="radio-preview-bubblegum"
            palette="accent"
            sizing="tiny"
            value="bubblegum"
        >
            Bubblegum
        </Radio>

        <Radio
            id="radio-preview-chocolate"
            palette="accent"
            sizing="tiny"
            value="chocolate"
        >
            Chocolate
        </Radio>

        <Radio
            id="radio-preview-vanilla"
            palette="accent"
            sizing="tiny"
            value="vanilla"
        >
            Vanilla
        </Radio>
    </Form.Group>
</Stack>
data.title: Radio Preview
